description: Brand new to NK we have the legendary Ricky Sinz taking on Parker London, while Tyler Alexander goes toe to toe with Sebastian Keys. Sebastian starts off the first round sitting on Tyler's face, muffling Tyler's screams as he beats Tyler's ass red. But Tyler answers right back putting Sebastian in several struggling holds. Next round, Parker and Ricky go balls to the wall, ferociously fighting for sexual dominancy. Unfortunately Parker injures his shoulder and had to sit the tag team round out. Even with the 2 on 1 odds, Ricky manages to hold his own through the strategic tags of Sebastian and Tyler. It's total mayhem and chaos in the end, but someone is getting double penetrated!
title: Mini Tournament NK Style - Battles of the Bad Boys
